title: League Won't Respond(Mac)
body:
For the past few weeks (3ish) I will click on league to open it and play.  The icon shows up that it is trying to open it. Nothing happens for a while.  I will check on it in task manager and it says league is not responding.  So I force quit it, then try to open it again from a different spot (finder folders).  Sometimes it will open from going to a different location but others it doesn't.  If it doesn't open then, then I have to restart my computer.  Generally if I restart my computer it works.  I shouldn't have to restart my computer every time I want to play league? Help?

This is for a mac by the way.

replies.body: You may need to adjust some of those Mac admin permissions to make sure League to able to access it's game files properly. Reach out to this [**mac admin guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) for the steps on how to get those setup if you don't know how!
If I checked those and they were what they should be and league still won't respond?
hey pal, having the same issue on EUW here if you could find a respond or solution, can you let me know?

Hmmmm don't fret just yet. Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to look over some of your logs to see what's going wrong.
